Thanks for being so supportive and kind through these crazy times!💖

The Chickasaw Nation
February 21 at 3:33 PM ·

Chickasaw Nation Nutrition Services is accepting applications for the Summer EBT for Children program. To qualify, your child must be enrolled in a participating school district and receive free or reduced meals at school. Qualifying families will receive approximately $30 of food per child, per month during the three summer months.

Benefits are received on an EBT card that allows families to conveniently purchase healthy food for the summer. This federally funded program is open to both Native and non-Native families.

To view a list of participating school districts and apply, visit Chickasaw.net/SummerEBT or call (844) 256-3467.
